title: Use Azure Dev Spaces to collaborate with a team on Kubernetes: Part 3 | Azure Tips and Tricks
excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Dev Spaces to collaborate with a team on Kubernetes.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: https://azure.com/free
